document_data.caption: A map showing the Grampalt Highlands on Oman's Isle.
document_data.name: Grampalt Highlands
document_data.mainbody: The '''Grampalt Highlands''' was small mountain range located on [[Oman's Isle]] in the kingdom of [[Oman]] within the [[Moonshae Isles]].{{Cite interactive atlas}}{{Cite dungeon/196/Backdrop: The Moonshae Isles}}
document_data.Geography: The mountains covered much of the southern half of Oman's Isle, stretching for {{SI|100|mi|k|long=yes}} from one coast to another. They were between {{SI|30|mi|k|long=yes}}â€“{{SI|40|mi|k|long=yes}} wide on average. The Grampalt Highlands formed much of the northern border of the [[Strait of Oman]]. The [[Old Stone Wood]] bordered the mountain's western edge, while a swamp was found on the eastern side.
document_data.Inhabitants: The Grampalt Highlands were inhabited by [[giant]]s. [[Fomorian]]s from the [[Feywild]] later joined the giants.{{Cite dungeon/196/Backdrop: The Moonshae Isles|11}}
